## Initial setup {.unnumbered .unlisted}

```{r}
xquery <- function(xml_file, query, basex = "BaseX122.jar") {
  cat(system(
    sprintf("java -cp %s org.basex.BaseX -i '%s' -q '%s'", basex, xml_file, query),
    intern = TRUE
  ), sep = "\n")
}
```

## First exercise
